video.title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works
video.synopsis: High school students Rin and Shiro pair up as allies when they're chosen to compete in a secret tournament for possession of the Holy Grail.

episodes.synopsis: Young mage Rin Tosaka unleashes the legendary Archer to battle her classmates' warrior servants for the Holy Grail, but someone's not playing fair.
episodes.title: Prologue

episodes.synopsis: The events of the previous episode unfold from a different perspective, as Shirō wards off Lancer's attacks before summoning his own servant, Saber.
episodes.title: Winter Days, A Fateful Night

episodes.synopsis: Rin tries to explain the Holy Grail War to Shirō, including her own role as Master, with the help of her guardian, Kirei Kotomine.
episodes.title: The Curtain Goes Up

episodes.synopsis: Rin, Archer, Shirō and Saber face a new girl's seemingly unstoppable servant, Berserker, in a long-ranging battle that could destroy them all.
episodes.title: The First Battle

episodes.synopsis: Shirō learns the truth about Saber and how the seven Servants function. Meanwhile, Rin and Archer battle a foe who's feeding on human life energy.
episodes.title: Finding the Will to Fight

episodes.synopsis: Rin threatens to harm Shirō if he doesn't relinquish his Command Seals, but they forge a truce when an unknown Servant attacks.
episodes.title: Dancing After School

episodes.synopsis: Agreeing to a truce, Rin and Shirō track the unknown female Servant, stumbling upon a secret that unlocks a greater conspiracy.
episodes.title: Mirage

episodes.synopsis: After defending Shirō from Caster, Archer lets the attacking female Servant flee, a decision that angers and confuses Shirō.
episodes.title: The Reward for the Fight to the Death

episodes.synopsis: Shinji creates a new, stronger barrier around the school, sapping the energy of all inside except Rin and Shirō, who are beset by unearthly creatures.
episodes.title: Winter Days, Where the Heart Is

episodes.synopsis: After talking over dinner with Taiga and Saber, Shirō wonders if he wants to become a "hero of justice" simply to follow in Kiritsugu's path.
episodes.title: The Distance Between Them

episodes.synopsis: Shirō and Saber help Rin test her theory that Kuzuki is Caster's Master, but the truth is more sinister than any of them could have imagined.
episodes.title: The Fifth Contractor

episodes.synopsis: As a wounded Shirō and Rin plan a strategy against Caster, Shirō finds that he must defend his ideals to both her and Archer.
episodes.title: A Visitor Approaches Lightly

episodes.synopsis: Shirō, Rin and Saber are trapped inside an invisible barrier by Caster, who unleashes unknown powers against them in a battle for the Holy Grail.
episodes.title: The Final Decision

episodes.synopsis: Shirō reflects on previous events and remembers Kiritsugu's ideals. Meanwhile, Rin visits Kirei at church and makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Despite recent setbacks, Shirō decides to continue his battle for the Holy Grail. Rin proposes an exceptional alliance with Illyasviel.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Illyasviel has a strange encounter with her mother, during which she learns the secrets of her family and their role in the battle for the Holy Grail.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Shirō's group goes to battle against Shinji. A battle for life and death ensues, at the end of which the identity of Shinji's servant is revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Rin and Shirō once again face Caster and his Master. Meanwhile, Archer reveals his plan to Lancer.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: While Shirō and Saber try to rescue Rin from Illyasviel's estate, they get help from a very unexpected source.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Archer and Saber reveal their past. Who has reached their ideals more successfully? Archer points out parallels between his and Shirō's motivations.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Archer has revealed his true identity and fights a bloody battle against Shirō. Tin and Lancer continue to encounter severe problems with Shinji.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Shirō is close to losing the battle against Archer. But both of them are haunted by fragments of memories, which Shirō wants to take advantage of.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: The Holy Grail is supposed to be called upon at the Ryūdō Temple. Rin thinks that Shirō can prevail in the battle only with Unlimited Blade Works.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Rin and Shirō want to destroy the Holy Grail at the Ryūdō Temple. Meanwhile, Saber engages in a fierce duel against the temple guard.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: All the remaining fighters in the battle over the Holy Grail face each other in a final battle for life and death. Who will prevail?
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: After the events in Japan, the survivors are now members of the magicians' school in London. Old acquaintances and new protagonists enter the scene.
episodes.title: Episode 26
